title: Why people don't like Flex Queue in one picture
body:
Played against this team in Flex. I'm Silver 4...

https://imgur.com/gallery/AFN6F

EDIT: I go into Solo and Flex as a single person, rarely do I invite friends to ranked. In this game I was not with a premade team.

replies.body:
Yeah, basically.

Has Riot ever addressed this?
People don't take the queue seriously. They're going to scrap it or something later.
exactly.  people I've seen invite whoever they feel like and just play somewhat seriously.
Flex Queue are the horse shit residues left behind from Season 5's and 6's Dynamic Queue. It's no wonder it's as imbalanced as ever.
what am i suppose to see here ? is it saying level 30 is higher than plat 2 in tier wise ?

> [{quoted}](name=Gelmous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R6f1kU9R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-03T00:44:15.798+0000)
>
> what am i suppose to see here ? is it saying level 30 is higher than plat 2 in tier wise ?

you're seeing a very diverse placement of ranks in a supposed "competitive environment".
aren't those solo queue ranks though ? doesn't flex have it's separate mmr ?

> [{quoted}](name=Gelmous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R6f1kU9R,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-07-03T01:29:21.676+0000)
>
> aren't those solo queue ranks though ? doesn't flex have it's separate mmr ?

DQ does have separate MMR. I assume what he's showing isn't soloq rank but dq rank otherwise he wouldn't be here. 

Even then there's bigger underlying problem with DQ than that when it replaced soloq in season 6 (fuck season 6 LOL).
Tbh this has been an issue since before dyna que.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R6f1kU9R,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2017-07-03T13:44:44.555+0000)
>
> Tbh this has been an issue since before dyna que.

but it's never as bad as dynamic q

> [{quoted}](name=Gelmous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R6f1kU9R,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-07-03T01:29:21.676+0000)
>
> aren't those solo queue ranks though ? doesn't flex have it's separate mmr ?

I'm Plat 1 in flex
D5 in solo

My flex games consist of gold 5-challenger solo queuers. lmfao.
And I'm gaining 28 lp per win. It's stupid. 
The queue times are ridiculous. I wait for about 15 minutes before I get into a game. I guess Riot's algorithm just puts people in random games if they wait too long
you're pretty lucky, in my flex queue games rank ranges from silver2 to challenger 900 LP... in the same game

If the matchmaking really wants to see if a silver player can beat a platinum player, I'm all for it. But it better put him with only silvers on his team and I want the entire enemy team to be platinum. Don't mix and match players into unbalanced teams.

Of course if it's the 5vs5 thing, then the players have only themselves to blame for picking their teammates and in that case it doesn't matter. But I'm guessing this guy is in a party of 2 or 3 or he wouldn't be complaining.
flex que is still a thing?
